import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useGetUser } from '../../hooks/useGetUser' import * as Styled from './styles' export const Menu =()=>{ const [ user, setUser ] = useState({}) const [ getCheckUser ] = useGetUser() useEffect(()=>{ getCheckUser().then(r => setUser(r)) }, [getCheckUser]) return( {user.image && }
